name: Perpetual Calendar Component
description:
A single main component that can represent any month, any year accurately by toggling a few variant properties.


The component is resizable (scalable) and includes date states and date range selection indicator.


I've also included a few printable calendars that were created with instances of this component.


---

Update 2021-01-03: Updated entire component to use variants instead of spacers for perpetuity. Added documentation and printable calendars.

Update 2020-06-10: Created separate components for 30-28 end dated weeks for better override preservation. Also removed selected date states from main default state for same reason.
